snippet.title: Where’s Samantha? Teaser
snippet.description:
Where’s Samantha? is a physics-based, story-driven, puzzle-platformer about a wool character named George who is on a quest to find the love of his life, Samantha. With a story full of laughter, sorrow, and love, this seemingly simple game will test players intellectually and emotionally. Collect the letters, reveal the pages, and finish this hero's journey.

Wishlist it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1497630/Wheres_Samantha/

Follow us for updates:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wheressamantha
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/wheresamantha
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wheressamanthagame/
